Package es.gencom.mpegg.io

Interface BitWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Flushable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MPEGWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MSBitBuffer, MSBitOutputArray, Payload, WritableMSBitChannel, WritableMSBitStream
    public interface BitWriter
extends Flushable

    Bit Writer interface with default implementation for basic Java types.

    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro
